message: Let's start fair. I propose a 60/40 split in my favor. I'm willing to negotiate if you have any other suggestions.
I think a 55/45 split is fairer, considering the inflation we'll both experience.  Let's be reasonable and get this done.
I appreciate your offer, but I still feel that a 55/45 split is more fair given the inflation. I'm willing to stick with my previous proposal.
